Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Position/Title: Content Writer
              
              Department: Marketing
              
              Business Unit: Sofacompany VN
              

              A.	GENERAL JOB FUNCTION
              

              As Sofacompany continues to grow, we are looking for a talented Content Writer to create compelling blog posts, social media content and content for email marketing. We are looking for someone who will help us expand our digital footprint and drive more value through online content. The ideal candidate should have a proven track record of producing content that increase engagement and drive leads. This position requires a high level of creativity, as well as the ability to use data-driven insights to write better material. The succesfull candidate should also be detail-oriented and committed to meeting tight deadlines. Preference will be given to those with a strong writing portfolio, bachelor’s degree and relevant work experience.
              

              The job will include, but not be limited to:
              
              •	Regulary produce various content types, including email, Social media posts, blogs and white papers
              
              •	Create content marketing campaigns to drive leads and subscribers.
              
              •	Use SEO best practice to generate traffic to our site
              
              •	Actively manage and promote our blog, and pitch articles to relevant third-party platforms
              
              •	Edit content produced by other members of the team
              
              •	Analyze content marketing metrics and make changes as needed
              
              •	Collaborate with other departments to create innovative content ideas
              

              B.	RESPONSIBILITIES, DUTIES & AUTHORITIES:
              
              •	Research industry-related topics
              
              •	Write clear content marketing to promoto our brand and products
              
              •	Proofread and edit blog posts before publication
              
              •	Coordinate with Marketing responsible and Graphic team to illustrate articles
              
              •	Conduct keyword research and use SEO to increase web traffic
              
              •	Promote content on Social Media
              
              •	Identify customers needs and gaps in our content and recommend new topics
              
              •	Ensure all-around consistency (Style, fonts, images and tone)
              

              C.	WORKING RELATIONSHIP
              
              1.	Internal: Related departments
              
              2.	External: KOL and bloggers
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              D.	EXPERIENCE & QUALIFICATION
              
              •	Bachelor degree in Journalism, Marketing or related filed
              
              •	Knowledge of digital marketing tactics, including SEO, email marketing and web analytics
              
              •	Excellent writing skills, as wall as the ability to communicate and collaborate effectively
              
              •	The ability to consistently meet tight deadlines
              
              •	At least 2 years of experience writing for a B2C audience
              
              •	Experience using WordPress
              
              •	You are fluent in both English and Vietnamese
              
              •	Preferrably you have been to Europe, or at least been working with an European company
              

              E. WORKING CONDITION
              
              Working place: Sofacompany VN at 218 Nguyen Van Huong, Thao Dien, D. 2, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
              

              Working time: Full time
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
